    • Uses of CPDQuery in bayes_network

      Methods in bayes_network that return CPDQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private CPDQuery BayesianNetwork.buildCPDQuery(BNNode node, java.lang.Integer nodeValue, java.util.ArrayList<pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer>> queryDetails)
      Given a node and a set of attribute/value pairs, this method constructs the proper CPDQuery object where the query object queries for a conditional probability of the target node given as assignemtn of this node's parents

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Double BNNode.query(CPDQuery query)

    • Uses of CPDQuery in bayes_network.cpd

      Methods in bayes_network.cpd with parameters of type CPDQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Double CPDNode.calculateProbability(CPDQuery query)
      If this node's attribute IS NOT included in the query, we sum the probabilities of this query over all of this node's children.

      Calculate the probability of a specific query on this leaf node

      Make a query on this CPD tree
